description:
Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to remove condition 13 (connection to future heating network) of planning permission P082373 dated 27 February 2009 for the 'Conversion of a vacant hostel to self-contained residential accommodation comprising a total of 14 no. units (8 no. 5-bedroom, 2 no. 2-bedroom wheelchair accessible units, and 4 no. 1-bedroom units - 100% affordable housing); reconfiguration of the front garden to provide new stairs to 8 no. upper floor units, stairs and ramp to lower ground floor and refuse storage; provision of stair access to rear gardens; alteration to fenestration in both front and rear elevations; replacement of front boundary wall and gates; and the felling of 6 trees within both the front and rear gardens (and replacement planting).
 This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 26/02/2012.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 27/02/2009 [LBI ref: P082373].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5)
